desc.cn: Clifm 是一个类似 shell 的基于文本的终端文件管理器，运行在命令行界面上。
desc.en: Clifm is a shell-like, text-based terminal file manager that sits on the command line.

ubuntu/apt.cmd:
echo 'deb http://download.opensuse.org/repositories/home:/archcrack/xUbuntu_24.04/ /' | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/home:archcrack.list && \
curl -fsSL https://download.opensuse.org/repositories/home:archcrack/xUbuntu_24.04/Release.key | gpg --dearmor | sudo tee /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/home_archcrack.gpg > /dev/null && \
sudo apt update && \
sudo apt install clifm

debian/apt.cmd:
echo 'deb http://download.opensuse.org/repositories/home:/archcrack/Debian_Testing/ /' | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/home:archcrack.list && \
curl -fsSL https://download.opensuse.org/repositories/home:archcrack/Debian_Testing/Release.key | gpg --dearmor | sudo tee /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/home_archcrack.gpg > /dev/null && \
sudo apt update && \
sudo apt install clifm

arch/pacman.cmd:
echo '[home_archcrack_Arch] \n
Server = https://download.opensuse.org/repositories/home:/archcrack/Arch/$arch' >> /etc/pacman.conf && \
key=$(curl -fsSL https://download.opensuse.org/repositories/home:archcrack/Arch/$(uname -m)/home_archcrack_Arch.key) && \
fingerprint=$(gpg --quiet --with-colons --import-options show-only --import --fingerprint <<< "${key}" | awk -F: '$1 == "fpr" { print $10 }') && \
sudo pacman-key --init && \
sudo pacman-key --add - <<< "${key}" && \
sudo pacman-key --lsign-key "${fingerprint}" && \
sudo pacman -Sy home_archcrack_Arch/clifm

centos/yum.cmd:
cd /etc/yum.repos.d/ && \
wget https://download.opensuse.org/repositories/home:archcrack/CentOS_8/home:archcrack.repo && \
sudo yum install clifm

fedora/dnf.cmd:
sudo dnf config-manager --add-repo https://download.opensuse.org/repositories/home:archcrack/Fedora_40/home:archcrack.repo && \
sudo dnf install clifm

opensuse/zypper.cmd:
sudo zypper addrepo https://download.opensuse.org/repositories/home:archcrack/openSUSE_Tumbleweed/home:archcrack.repo && \
sudo zypper refresh && \
sudo zypper install clifm
